171001_DESC-null-NA.name: Unlock these daily wonders with the Legendary Founder's Pack. Founder's Packs are available for purchase until 10/10.

171002_DESC-null-NA.name: You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 8:00 AM on 11/26 and 8:00 AM on 12/3.

171003_DESC-null-NA.name: You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 8:00 AM on 12/20 and 8:00 AM on 1/3.

171004_DESC-null-NA.name: You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 8:00 AM on 1/17 and 8:00 AM on 1/31.

171005_DESC-null-NA.name: You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 8:00 AM on 2/7 and 8:00 AM on 2/28.

171006_DESC-null-NA.name: You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 15:30 on 4/4 and 15:30 on 5/2.

171007_DESC-Event-NA.name: Returning players who log in between 4/25 3:30 PM and 5/2 23:59 will get a special item in the mail. (A returning player is any player who hasn't logged in for 84 days since 1/31/2019.)

171008_DESC-Event-NA.name: Pre-register for the 5/30 update on the MapleFest website between 5/11 and 5/29, and you'll get a special reward in the mail. Limited 1 per account.

171009_DESC-Event-NA.name: Gifts are distributed once per account for logging in with a level 5+ character between 15:30 on 5/30  and 15:30 on 6/27.

171010_DESC-Event-NA.name: You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 15:30 on 6/27 and 15:30 on 7/25.

581000_DESC-null-NA.name: It's your pal MC Kay, who you can definitely trust!

581001_DESC-null-NA.name: It's time for the Opposite OX Quiz, where the only way to win... is to lose!

620001_DESC-null-NA.name: I've got a fortune cookie with your name on it. It's not just luckyâ€”it's filled with goodies just for you! Go ahead, enjoy it. I'll see you back in Queenstown!
